SMBus Clock Divider Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x20
Size:
0x4

Description

Clock divider for SCL generation

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:16] reserved r 0x0 Reserved
[15:0] clk_div rw 0xf9 Clock Divider

Field Descriptions

reserved - Reserved

Reserved bits

clk_div - Clock Divider

SCL clock divider: SCL_freq = sys_clk / (4 * (div + 1)), default 100kHz @ 100MHz sys_clk
